summary: This ENB makes your graphics more beautiful and realistic. I hope you enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi48.tinypic.com/1t0vuf.jpg[/img]
[color=yellow][b]Recommended version of ENB:[/b][/color] 0.113

[youtube]ZSX4gDbhauU[/youtube]
[color=yellow][b]Note:[/b][/color] on this video you can see too dark shadow at day time. It\'s already fixed in 1.1beta![/center]

Soulstice ENB makes game beautiful: improves shadows, colours, lights etc. It\'s based on my own graphics tastes. Nights and dungeons are dark, but still playable. Please, do not forget that it is only beta version of my mod. I already know few bugs which will be fixed as soon as it possible. If you tried Soulstice ENB, please write your impressions in comments (what you like / dislike). It can help me with future editing. 

[center][img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/2s60unc.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=yellow][b]How to install:[/b][/color]
1. Download ENB 0.113 from enbdev.com;
2. Move d3d9.dll to Skyrim\'s main folder (where you can find TESV.exe and SkyrimLauncher.exe);
3. Copy Soulstice ENB to the same folder;
4. Run the game.

[b]* For uninstall just delete all copied files.[/b]

[color=yellow][b]My system:[/b][/color]
- Intel Core 2 Duo E8500 (3.33GHz);
- NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 (1 GB);
- 4GB DDR3 RAM;
- Windows 7 x64;
- 1280x1024 resolution.

[center][img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/300d74m.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=yellow][b]Credits to:[/b][/color]
[b]Boris Vorontsov[/b] - ENB Series creator.
[b]Matso[/b] - Depth of Field effect.
[b]HeliosDoubleSix[/b] - HD6 enbeffect.fx.
[b]LSiwora[/b] - I\'m using enbpalette.bmp from \"The Wilds ENB\". Don\'t know who is real author of this palette.
[b]Hodilton[/b] - Video with my settings.

[color=red][b]// I will make more detailed description after first release of Soulstice ENB. Now it\'s just a beta version.[/b][/color]
author: Soulstice

files.name: Soulstice ENB 1_2beta
files.changelogHtml:
Snow no more getting black colour at day time
More realistic fire
Better windows lights effects tonight
Edited bloom effect
Slightly perfomance optimized
